syllabus:
**Course Description**  
The quality of physical education teacher education (PETE) is critical to the quality of students' learning in physical education. The implementation of physical education curriculum changes and transformative teaching rely on the quality of PETE as well. Therefore, PETE plays a key role among the aspects of learning, curriculum and teaching in physical education. This course provides a comprehensive overview of the research on PETE for students who are interested in pursuing the relevant studies.  
  
**Course Objectives**

After taking this course, I will be able to:

1.analyze the challenges and relevant issues in terms of PETE with a wide range of knowledge

2.understand the policy and systems in PETE

3.know the trends and research directions in PETE
